main.changelog:
Changelog:
Pedal
- Increased control point count for force-travel curve 
- Added joystick mapping functionality
- Added ADS1220 support for V6 board
- Rudder packets now broadcasted instead of unicast
- Adjusted joystick ESP-NOW packet interval to 2ms, rudder to 5ms
- Increased serial baudrate for CH343-based boards (V4/V5/V6/PCBA v2)
- Added emergency button support for PCBA v2 users
- pedalupdate and serial tasks now execute in RAM
- Enabled function-level profiling
- DAP version: 152  
- Firmware version: 0.90.15
--- 
Bridge
- Improved USB HID joystick stability 
- Joystick updates only on value changes
- Removed Wi-Fi power limit
- DAP version: 152  
- Firmware version: 0.90.15
--- 
Plugin 
- Force-travel curve is now fully adjustable   
  - Right-click on canvas to add a control point  
  - Right-click on a point to remove it  
  - Supports 6 to 11 points  
- Added joystick mapping tab with deadzone control  
  - Similar interface to the force-travel curve  
  - Drag endpoints to define deadzone  
  - Supports 6 to 11 control points  
- Serial COM port now shows chip/device name
- Visual UI updates
- Improved error handling for custom effects
- Added update notifications
- Dynamically sets baudrate to 3M for V4/V5/V6/PCBA v2 boards
- DAP version: 152  
- Plugin version: 0.90.15
--- 
Rudder 
- Added helicopter mode 
- New configuration section for mode switching (Flight / Helicopter)
- Force-curve control now matches functionality of the Pedal tab
- Plugin now remembers last-used configuration parameters  
  - Import/export config remains supported

dev-build.changelog:
FOR USER WHO USE PCBA V2 or PCB V3 and its verison is 0.90.15 or below, please update this build via USB, DO NOT UPDATE VIA OTA
0.90.19:
Pedal
1. Replaced USB stack libraries with Adafruit TinyUSB and recreated the joystick libraries.
2. Added debug flag 32 to reset default servo tunes.
3. Added a delay to get the MAC address, which fixes an issue where the MAC address was not being overwritten for ESP-NOW.
4. Removed an environment that is no longer maintained.
5. DAP version: 156
6. Firmware version: 0.90.19

Bridge
1. Replaced USB stack libraries with Adafruit TinyUSB.
2. Created the libraries for the joystick.
3. Bridge debug mode now prints joystick values when they change.
4. DAP version: 156
5. Firmware version: 0.90.19

Plugin
1. Removed the delay in the SimHub game data session.
2. Refactored action sending.
3. Changed the action interval to Effect FPS. This option only works with the paid version of SimHub; the free version is limited to 10 FPS.
4. DAP version: 156
5. Plugin version: 0.90.19


0.90.18:
Pedal :
1. Fixed an issue where a MAC address overflow caused a boot loop.
2. Firmware version: 0.90.18
Bridge:
1. Firmware version: 0.90.18
Plugin:
1. Plugin version: 0.90.18

0.90.17:Pedal:
1. Runtime improvements.
2. Removed the BLE gamepad function on PCB V3 due to RAM capacity concerns.
3. General code refactoring.
4. DAP version: 156
5. Firmware version: 0.90.17

Bridge
1. Separated Serial TX and RX into different tasks to improve runtime 
2. performance.
3. Added a task scheduler for better task handling.
4. Actions and configurations are now saved in a buffer.
5. Implemented a new message queue for debug messages.
6. General code refactoring.
7. DAP version: 156
8. Firmware version: 0.90.17

Plugin
1. Fixed a bug that caused an incorrect CRC to be sent when enabling the rudder.
2. DAP version: 156
3. Plugin version: 0.90.17
